class_notes: EH department students have priority until November 8, then non-department students can enroll.
course_description: Prerequisite: EH 520 or instructor¿s permission. This course is focused on understanding and evaluating the targets, molecular mechanisms, and physiological effects of specific environmental chemicals on the nervous system. This knowledge will be supplemented through outside readings and class discussions that serve to support the students¿ understanding of the material and provide them with a real-world perspective of neurotoxicology.
sections: Class Nbr: 3197, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-2:50p, Instructor: Caudle/Bellman, Status: Open
